name: OCKButtonLogTaskController
desc: A task controller that keeps a record of events, sorted by their dates.

items.name: func appendOutcomeValue(withType: OCKOutcomeValueUnderlyingType, at: IndexPath, completion: ((Result<OCKAnyOutcome, Error>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds an outcome value to the array of outcomes for an event.

items.name: func eventFor(indexPath: IndexPath) -> OCKAnyEvent?
items.desc: Returns the event at a specific index path from a task view controllers' collection view.

items.name: func makeOutcomeFor(event: OCKAnyEvent, withValues: [OCKOutcomeValue]) -> OCKAnyOutcome
items.desc: Creates and returns an outcome for a specific event.

items.name: func setEvent(atIndexPath: IndexPath, isComplete: Bool, completion: ((Result<OCKAnyOutcome, Error>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Sets a specific event for a task view controller, and creates an outcome value if the task is complete.

items.name: func initiateDeletionForOutcomeValue(atIndex: Int, eventIndexPath: IndexPath, deletionCompletion: ((Result<OCKAnyOutcome, Error>) -> Void)?) -> UIAlertController
items.desc: Returns an alert controller with localized text, to confirm deleting an outcome.

items.name: func initiateDetailsViewController(forIndexPath: IndexPath) -> OCKDetailViewController
items.desc: Returns a detail view controller to display for the task the user selected.
